testcase.name: Successful Login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch chrome Browser............................................passed When user opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login?ReturnUrl=%2Fadmin%2F".passed And user enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and password as "admin"......passed And click on Login..........................................................passed Then page Title should be "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration"..........passed When User clicks on log out link............................................passed Then page Title should be "Your Store. Login"...............................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
